title: Why is honor system not on yet in na?
body:
Dear riot porocles,

Honor system is supposed to be implemented in 7.13, thus its not here! May i have explanation about it!?

replies.body: It is indeed aimed to go live during 7.13, per the[ patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-713-notes).  That might not mean on the same day, though.  Hang tight for now, and we'll see it when it's ready to go live.
Ok thank you for your time:)
